column2: "I lied. I wasn't ready to die..."
"My weakness ended up costing your lives..."
"I doubt you remember, but the two of us made a promise."
"We have assimilated [Profound Darkness]. By this, both your lives will be saved."
"Yet, this also means [Profound Darkness] lives on... and in time, it will regain its full form."
"I have not seen a future where mankind succeeds against the new avatar and its Falz entourage..."
"But by the same token, I have never witnessed a future where Matoi survived."
"<%me>... the future is yours to make."
"Weave Us a new future, beyond the horizon of what We can see..."
